languages.text: "Уничтожение священной десятины. Размножение без разрешения. Повторная клевета на Адептус Арбитес. Я лишаю вас права молить о пощаде при задержании".
"Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy during the arrest."
languages.original_text: "Уничтожение священной десятины. Размножение без разрешения. Повторная клевета на Адептус Арбитес. Я лишаю вас права молить о пощаде при задержании".

traits.locale_text: "Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy while apprehended."
"Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy while apprehended."
"Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy while apprehended."
"Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy while apprehended."
"Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy during the arrest."
"Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy during the arrest."

languages.text: «Destrucción del diezmo sagrado. Reproducción no autorizada. Difamación repetida del Adeptus Arbites. Les retiro el derecho a rogar piedad durante el arresto».
languages.original_text: "Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy during the arrest."

traits.locale_text: «Destrucción del diezmo sagrado. Reproducción no autorizada. Difamación repetida del Adeptus Arbites. Les retiro el derecho a rogar piedad durante el arresto».

languages.text: “擅自破坏神圣的什一税，未经允许繁殖后代，屡次诽谤法务部成员。我在此废除你在被捕期间求饶的权利。”
languages.original_text: "Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy during the arrest."

traits.locale_text: “擅自破坏神圣的什一税，未经允许繁殖后代，屡次诽谤法务部成员。我在此废除你在被捕期间求饶的权利。”

languages.text: 「聖なる租税の破壊。無許可の生殖。繰り返される高等裁定局への中傷。逮捕時の慈悲を求める権利を認めない」
languages.original_text: "Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy during the arrest."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる租税の破壊。無許可の生殖。繰り返される高等裁定局への中傷。逮捕時の慈悲を求める権利を認めない」

languages.text: « Destruction de la dîme sacrée. Reproduction non autorisée. Diffamations répétées de l'Adeptus Arbites. Voilà qui suffit amplement à révoquer votre droit à implorer grâce dans le cadre de votre arrestation. »
languages.original_text: "Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy during the arrest."

traits.locale_text: « Destruction de la dîme sacrée. Reproduction non autorisée. Diffamations répétées de l'Adeptus Arbites. Voilà qui suffit amplement à révoquer votre droit à implorer grâce dans le cadre de votre arrestation. »

languages.text: "Kutsal aşarın tahribi. Kayıt dışı üreme. Adeptus Arbites'e defalarca hakaret. Tutuklama esnasında merhamet dilenme hakkını feshediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy during the arrest."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal aşarın tahribi. Kayıt dışı üreme. Adeptus Arbites'e defalarca hakaret. Tutuklama esnasında merhamet dilenme hakkını feshediyorum."

languages.text: "Zerstörung des heiligen Zehnts. Unlizenzierte Reproduktion. Wiederholte Beleidigung des Adeptus Arbites. Ich hebe Euer Recht, um Gnade zu ersuchen, während der Inhaftierung auf."
languages.original_text: "Destruction of the sacred tithe. Unlicensed reproduction. Repeated defamation of the Adeptus Arbites. I revoke your right to beg for mercy during the arrest."

traits.locale_text: "Zerstörung des heiligen Zehnts. Unlizenzierte Reproduktion. Wiederholte Beleidigung des Adeptus Arbites. Ich hebe Euer Recht, um Gnade zu ersuchen, während der Inhaftierung auf."
